name: Marra Young

aboutpara:

Outside of engineering, I love spending time outdoorsâ€”especially at the beachâ€”playing video games with my family, reading, and hanging out with my French bulldogs. Iâ€™m curious by nature, detail-oriented, and always excited to learn something new.

experiences.position: Herlihy, Young, and Niemic LLC | Intern
experiences.bullets: Coordinated and directed all social media presence and website maintenance || Revamped filing system to better streamline the organization of client information and invoices || Handled public relations efforts to successfully increase company visibility and engagement

experiences.position: Timed Lab Ordering Training Simulation Platform
experiences.bullets: Developing a web-based clinical lab ordering simulation for Augusta University featuring timed decision-making role-based access and realistic clinical constraints using React and Firebase

Designed autonomous car tracking audio sources at C8 (4186 Hz) and C6 (1046 Hz) using dual microphone arrays and custom 3D-printed acoustic cones || Constructed SAR ADC from discrete components enabling digital signal processing without specialized ICs || Designed PCB schematics in Autodesk Fusion integrating power supply, filters, and ADC subsystems
Developed application displaying local UV indexes based on user input and geographical location using multiple API integrations
